item.title: Is Silicon Valley Losing Its Influence on DC?
item.description: This episode of Uncanny Valley covers black holes, woke AI, and the relationship between Silicon Valley billionaires and the Trump Administration.

item.title: Google Chrome adds AI-powered store summaries to help US shoppers
item.description: The feature will display a pop-up that informs consumers about the store's reputation for things like product quality, shopping, pricing, customer ser...

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Tesla vs GM: A tale of two earnings
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility, your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: Tesla signs $16.5B deal with Samsung to make AI chips
item.description: The deal for next-generation chips is a boon for Samsung.

item.title: 20 national security experts urge Trump administration to restrict Nvidia H20 sales to China
item.description: The letter states that allowing sales of the H20 AI chip to China could hurt the U.S.'s AI "edge" and worsen chip bottlenecks in the U.S.
